metadata.title: Set Up Xata Database with Branching

story.iWant: Xata database configured with branch-per-environment strategy
story.soThat: dev/staging/production have isolated data and PR previews get dedicated branches

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Xata project created with main database instance
Three persistent branches created: dev, staging, production
Database schema initialized (defer table definitions to Epic 2, just structure)
Xata CLI authenticated and configured locally
Environment variables set per environment pointing to correct Xata branch
Automated daily backups confirmed operational in Xata dashboard
PR preview branch auto-creation configured (verify in Story 1.4)

doc.section: Story 1.2: Set Up Xata Database with Branching

docs.doc: Complete technical specification for Story 1.2 including Xata project setup, branch strategy, Prisma configuration, connection strings per environment, and testing procedures.
Complete Prisma schema design with datasource configuration for Xata (Postgres-compatible), generator settings, and all entity models. Shows initial schema structure to be created in this story.
Prisma schema.prisma initial configuration showing datasource provider (postgresql), url from env variable, and generator settings. This is the baseline schema to create in Story 1.2.
Documentation on accessing Cloudflare context via getContext('cloudflare'), environment variables configuration, and how ENVIRONMENT variable works across dev/staging/production.
Complete setup instructions for Cloudflare Workers Builds, environment configuration, and deployment strategy. Critical for understanding how Xata branches map to deployment environments.

artifact.reason: Main Cloudflare Workers configuration showing environment structure (dev/staging/production) where XATA_BRANCH variables must be added per Story 1.2 requirements

code.artifact: Current wrangler.jsonc defines three environments with ENVIRONMENT variables. Story 1.2 requires adding XATA_BRANCH variables to staging and production env blocks.

ecosystem.name: node
ecosystem.package: Xata CLI for project initialization, authentication, branch management
Prisma client for database access (generated from schema)

constraints.constraint: Use Prisma as ORM for type-safe database access (per solution architecture)
All database credentials must be stored as Cloudflare secrets, never committed to version control
Schema tables deferred to Epic 2, Story 2.1 - this story only sets up infrastructure (datasource + generator configuration)
Xata provides automatic daily backups with 7-day retention on free tier - no additional configuration needed
CLOUDFLARE_ENV environment variable must be set at build time in Cloudflare dashboard (not deploy time)
Branch-per-environment strategy: dev (local), staging (master branch), production (production branch), PR previews (auto-created/deleted)

tests.standards:
This is an infrastructure setup story focused on external service configuration (Xata database and Prisma ORM). Testing primarily involves manual verification steps rather than automated unit tests:
- Manual verification via Xata dashboard (confirm branches exist, backups enabled) - Manual CLI testing (xata init, xata auth login, xata branch create commands) - Manual connection testing via simple health check API route - Configuration validation (verify wrangler.jsonc changes, .dev.vars setup)
No automated test suite required for this story per project testing standards (Vitest/React Testing Library used for application code, not infrastructure setup).
tests.locations: No automated test files required. Manual testing procedures documented in Dev Notes section of story file (lines 120-133) and tech spec (lines 296-308).

ideas.test-idea: Verify Xata project initialization: Run 'xata init' command, confirm project created in Xata dashboard, verify .xata/ directory created locally with config file
Verify branch creation: Navigate to Xata dashboard at https://app.xata.io/workspaces/[workspace]/databases/printfarm-manager, confirm three branches visible (dev, staging, production)
Verify Prisma schema: Create prisma/schema.prisma with datasource and generator only (no tables), run 'npx prisma generate', confirm @prisma/client generated in node_modules
Test dev connection: Add DATABASE_URL to .dev.vars, run 'npm run dev', create simple API route that logs cf.env.DATABASE_URL, verify connection string format correct
Verify environment variables: Check wrangler.jsonc has XATA_BRANCH vars in staging/production env blocks, verify .dev.vars has DATABASE_URL (gitignored)
Confirm backups: Navigate to Xata dashboard → Settings → Backups, verify "Daily backups" enabled, retention set to 7 days (default on free tier)
Document PR preview strategy: Add note to documentation explaining PR preview branches auto-created by Cloudflare during deployment (actual testing deferred to Story 1.4 CI/CD setup)
